name: penetratingly
content:
penetratingly adverb
(EXTREMELY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is extreme, very strong, or that you feel very strongly: The wind was from the north and penetratingly cold. The leaves are penetratingly aromatic.
More examplesFewer examplesThe voices had become barely audible; but the smell had grown penetratingly strong.

penetratingly adverb
(UNDERSTANDING)
in a way that understands things quickly and well: His description is warmly enthusiastic as well as penetratingly intelligent. At times, he was penetratingly sharp.
If someone looks at you penetratingly, they seem to know what you are thinking: She looked at me penetratingly. His eyes always seemed to focus sharply and penetratingly on whoever he was talking to.
More examplesFewer examplesShe demonstrates a penetratingly accurate eye for detail.He went on, smiling at me with his penetratingly blue eyes.
